mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PROGRAM (PROGRAM_NO, USER_NO, PROGRAM_NAME, PROGRAM_ACTIVITY_START_DATE, PROGRAM_ACTIVITY_END_DATE, ACTIVITY_TYPE, ACTIVITY_TIME, ACTIVITY_DAYS, ACTIVITY_LOCATION, PROGRAM_CAPACITY, PROGRAM_ENROLL_END_DATE, PROGRAM_CONTENT, STATUS) VALUES (SEQ_PROGRAMNO.NEXTVAL, #{userNo}, #{programName}, #{programActivityStartDate}, #{programActivityEndDate}, #{activityType}, #{activityTime}, #{activityDays}, #{activityLocation}, #{programCapacity}, #{programEnrollEndDate}, #{programContent}, 'Y' )
mapper.select: SELECT PROGRAM_NO, USER_NO, PROGRAM_NAME, TO_CHAR(PROGRAM_ACTIVITY_START_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') PROGRAM_ACTIVITY_START_DATE, TO_CHAR(PROGRAM_ACTIVITY_END_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') PROGRAM_ACTIVITY_END_DATE, ACTIVITY_TYPE, ACTIVITY_TIME, ACTIVITY_DAYS, SUBSTR(ACTIVITY_LOCATION,3) AS ACTIVITY_LOCATION, PROGRAM_CAPACITY, TO_CHAR(PROGRAM_ENROLL_END_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') PROGRAM_ENROLL_END_DATE, PROGRAM_CONTENT FROM PROGRAM WHERE PROGRAM_NO = #{programNo}
select count(*) from request where program_no = #{programNo}

select PROGRAM_NO, PROGRAM_NAME, ACTIVITY_TYPE, TO_CHAR(PROGRAM_ACTIVITY_START_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') AS PROGRAM_ACTIVITY_START_DATE, TO_CHAR(PROGRAM_ACTIVITY_END_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') AS PROGRAM_ACTIVITY_END_DATE, ACTIVITY_DAYS, ACTIVITY_TIME, SUBSTR(ACTIVITY_LOCATION,3) AS ACTIVITY_LOCATION, PROGRAM_ENROLL_END_DATE FROM PROGRAM where PROGRAM_ACTIVITY_END_DATE>sysdate order by 1 desc
SELECT * FROM REQUEST WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND PROGRAM_NO = #{programNo}
